Header: Rice set apart as animal food on sale in Pettah after two years-Namal Karunaratne
Content: A stock of rice that were sold as animal food two years ago are now available on for sale in Pettah, National Organizer od All-Island Farmers Federation Namal Karunaratne says. He said this during a press conference held with small and medium scale rice millers in Kurunegala yesterday.
